home.conference_info_1: PragVue is back for its second edition, celebrating the power and potential of Vue.js in the heart of Europe. We‚Äôre bringing famous names from Vue.js community to the City of a Hundred Spires for an event packed with inspiring talks. It‚Äôs the perfect opportunity to grow your skills, network with like-minded professionals, and stay ahead in the rapidly evolving world of Vue.js.
home.conference_info_2: Vue.js is easy to learn, scalable, highly performant thanks to its coherent reactivity system, and has a rich ecosystem of surrounding libraries. Despite its greatness, Vue.js remains undiscovered by many. That's precisely why we're hosting this conference - to delve deeper into its potential and shed light on its remarkable capabilities.
home.conference_info_tickets: Early bird ticket price available until the end of June
home.speakers_info: Get ready to be inspired by an outstanding lineup of Vue.js community members who will share their knowledge, hands-on experience, and fresh perspectives. Expect everything from closer look to ecosytem tools to big-picture views on modern web practices. Whether you‚Äôre a long-time Vue enthusiast or just starting out, you‚Äôll find plenty to spark new ideas. Don‚Äôt miss the opportunity to learn from and connect with skilled professionals.
home.speakers_you_info: We still seek for a few more speakers! Whether you are an experienced conference patroon or you still look for your first opportunity to rise and shine, now's your chance. If you have something to say about Vue, contact us via button bellow to discuss details.
home.look_back_on_2024: PragVue 2024 was a blast! Last year, we hosted the first Czech Vue.js conference. Thank you to all the attendees and all the speakers. We‚Äôre hoping to make the next one even better!
home.sponsors_info: Gain valuable exposure, connect with a passionate audience of developers, and help us shape the future of Vue.js by sponsoring PragVue. Seize this chance to connect with talented developers,share your vision, and shine a spotlight on your brand. Contact us for sponsorship options.

Baroshem.short_description: Software Developer, Technical Diver, Traveller, and Cat Lover

idea.title: The first Czech Vue.js conference
idea.a1: Vue.js is a dynamic, flexible, and fast-evolving technology that competes with the most popular frontend development stacks (React, Angular).
idea.a2: Vue.js can be used whenever you need to create a web-based application, ranging from static HTML presentations to complex dynamic webs or even mobile apps. Vue is a suitable choice for all these scenarios.
idea.q3: Why is Vue better than other alternatives?
idea.a3: Vue.js is easy to learn, scalable, highly performant thanks to its coherent reactivity system, and has a rich ecosystem of surrounding libraries.
idea.idea: Despite its greatness, Vue.js remains undiscovered by many. That's precisely why we're hosting this conference - to delve deeper into its potential and shed light on its remarkable capabilities.
idea.action: Are you ready to know more about Vue?
